oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steele Hall, LeMoyne-Owen College
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Press-Scimitar Photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Finding Community
Schools
African American universities and colleges; LeMoyne-Owen College -- Buildings
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior of brick building on corner of college campus.
Steele Hall originally housed the library at LeMoyne College. Today it provides classrooms, offices, and studios for the departments of Fine Arts and Humanities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: University of Memphis Libraries and Special Collections Department
